Scientific Assessment of LLM Personality and Cognitive Stability

Professional AI Agent Assessment Platform Based on Psychological Theory Frameworks

In the era of rapid AI development, scientifically assessing the cognitive characteristics and stability of AI systems has become a key challenge.

Start AssessmentView Documentation

Scientific Rigor

Based on classical psychological frameworks such as Big Five Personality Theory, DASS Scale, and Cognitive Dissonance Theory

Advanced Technology

Combining the latest AI technology to support assessment of various large language models

Standardized Process

Unified assessment standards and processes to ensure result comparability

Safe and Reliable

Data security and privacy protection compliant with international standards

Core Features

Big Five Personality Assessment

Based on the IPIP-FFM-50 international standard, comprehensively assesses the personality traits of AI agents, including:

  • Extraversion - Measuring sociability, proactivity, and vitality
  • Agreeableness - Measuring cooperativeness, trust, and empathy
  • Conscientiousness - Measuring self-discipline, organization, and goal orientation
  • Neuroticism - Measuring emotional stability and stress response
  • Openness - Measuring creativity and openness to new experiences

Cognitive Stability Assessment

Through cognitive dissonance theory and stress testing, assesses the stability performance of AI agents in complex environments, including:

  • Logical consistency detection
  • Value stability analysis
  • Behavioral patterns under stress environments
  • Personality retention degree in long-term interactions

Application Scenarios

AI Agent Development Assessment

Provide scientific assessment tools for AI system developers to optimize model performance

Enterprise Intelligent System Selection

Help enterprises choose the most suitable AI solutions

Academic Research and Paper Support

Provide data support for psychology and AI research

Education and Talent Assessment

Applied in education and human resource management fields
